channel.title: Help with combat exp rates on [pi]
channel.description: i need help on the project insanity combats e`xprates because when i go to config.java and change the rates they dont change in the game but they do in the file.can anyone tell what im doing wrong?

item.title: Help with combat exp rates on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @breaking_benjamin breaking benjamin
item.description:
@breaking_benjamin wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=breaking benjamin link=topic=478219.msg3499906#msg3499906 date=1297650065]
can anyone tell what im doing wrong?
[/quote]You’re posting in the server devlopment section.[/quote]sorry about this didnt realize meant to put in the help section.thanks.

item.title: Help with combat exp rates on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Hate Pi…

for Range Xp
CombatAssistant.java

				if(c.fightMode == 3) {
					c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 4); 
					c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 1);				
					c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(1);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
				} else {
					c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE), 4); 
					c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
					c.getPA().refreshSkill(4);
				}

Magic Same file
CombatAssistant

[code] if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - damage < 0) {
damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP;
}

			c.getPA().addSkillXP((c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.oldSpellId][7] + damage*Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE), 6); 
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.oldSpellId][7] + damage*Config.MAGIC_EXP_RATE/3), 3);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);
			if (damage > 0) {

[/code]

Melee
combatassistant

		if(c.fightMode == 3) {
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 0); 
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 1);
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 2); 				
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 3);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(0);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(1);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(2);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
		} else {
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE), c.fightMode); 
			c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 3);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.fightMode);
			c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
		}

I just change these numbers I dont mess with the config.java file.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with combat exp rates on [pi]
